characters.name: Bill
characters.bio: Bill S. Preston Esquire is one-half of the most excellent band Wyld Stallyns. He travels through time with his best friend Ted to finish his history report.

characters.name: Ted
characters.bio: Ted "Theodore" Logan is one-half of the most excellent band Wyld Stallyns. On the threats of his dad who wants to send him to military school, Ted has to finish his history report with best friend Bill.

characters.name: Rufus
characters.bio: Rufus is a most triumphant dude who assists Bill & Ted. He is from the future and plays a most excellent guitar.

characters.name: Missy
characters.bio: Missy is Bill's step-mom. She was a senior when Bill and Ted were freshmen.

characters.name: Death
characters.bio: The Grim Reaper himself! He challenges Bill and Ted in a best 2-out-of-3 match for their life!
characters.quote: "You might be a king or a little street sweeper, but sooner or later you dance with the reaper."

characters.name: Princesses
characters.bio: In 14th Century medieval England, Princess Joanna and Princess Elizabeth meet Bill and Ted who they fall in love with.
characters.quote: "And what is this message you speak of?"

characters.name: Station
characters.bio: Station is an alien Bill and Ted meet in heaven. He is a supremely intelligent being and helps Bill and Ted defeat the Evil Robot Us's.

characters.name: Napoleon
characters.bio: Napoleon is in the middle of battle when he is taken by Bill & Ted to assist with their history report. He is fond of water slides and a Ziggy Piggy champion ice-cream eater.

characters.name: Captain Logan
characters.bio: Ted's dad threatens to send Ted to military school if he doesn't behave. He is mad that he spends all his time with Bill and thinks he's a slacker.
characters.quote: "I spoke to Colonel Oates this morning. He's anxious to meet you, Ted..."

characters.name: Deacon Logan
characters.bio: Deacon is Ted's younger brother and ends up babysitting Napoleon.

characters.name: Socrates
characters.bio: Socrates is a great philosopher from ancient Greece. When Bill and Ted walk into the middle of his lecture, they philosophize with him with the help of some rock lyrics: "All we are is dust in the wind".
characters.quote: "Like sands of the hourglass, so are the days of our lives."

characters.name: Abraham Lincoln
characters.bio: Abraham Lincoln was the 16th president of the United States. He helps Bill and Ted with their history report.

characters.name: Evil Robot Uses
characters.bio: Created by De Nomolos to defeat Bill and Ted.
